description: This header file defines utility functions for file synchronization and JSON settings persistence within the Utils namespace. It includes functions to synchronize file contents to disk and to persist JSON settings by file I/O operations.

methods.name: void syncPersistFile(const string file)
methods.description: Synchronizes the specified file to disk to ensure all buffered data is written to storage.

methods.name: void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
methods.description: Persists a JSON value associated with a key into a file, updating existing settings or creating new ones, and then syncs the file to disk.

ctags.name: persistJsonSettings
ctags.pattern: /^inline void persistJsonSettings(const string strFile, const string strKey, const JsonValue& jsVa/
ctags.signature: (const string strFile,const string strKey,const JsonValue & jsValue)
